sentences.en: ' she decided, moreover, that he had a right to her utmost aid. "
sentences.cn: 她还认为, 他有权要她倾力相助.

sentences.en: A talented artist, he was, moreover, a writer of some note.
sentences.cn: 他是一位有才华的艺术家，同时也是颇有名气的作家。

sentences.en: Bicycling is a good exercise ; moreover, it is easy to learn.
sentences.cn: 骑自行车是一种很好的锻炼方式, 并且还容易学.

sentences.en: I don't like skating, moreover, the ice is too thin.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢滑冰, 而且冰又太薄.

sentences.en: I don't want to go skating and, moreover, the ice is too thin.
sentences.cn: 我不想去滑冰, 再说, 冰也太薄了.

sentences.en: Moreover , the restrictions have been subject to changing formulations.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者, 限制一直处于不断变化之中.

sentences.en: Moreover, courts can supply a generalist perspective that single - mission agencies often lack.
sentences.cn: 此外, 法院还可提供单一职能机关常常缺少的综合观点.

sentences.en: Moreover, extensive use of voluntary recalls can undercut agency accountability.
sentences.cn: 此外, 大量利用自愿撤回会削弱行政机关的责任心.

sentences.en: Moreover, he wanted to assure himself that Huck had remained discreet.
sentences.cn: 而且, 他想搞清楚,哈克是否始终没把这个秘密泄露出去.

sentences.en: Moreover, health and fire codes are frequently enforced by criminal processes.
sentences.cn: "再者, 卫生和防火法规经常通过刑事程序得到执行.

sentences.en: Moreover, Ramsay was no mean thinker himself.
sentences.cn: 而且拉姆齐自己也是一位出色的思想家。

sentences.en: The price is too high, and moreover, the house isn't in a suitable position.
sentences.cn: 这幢房子价钱太贵, 再者地脚也不好.

sentences.en: The rent is reasonable and, moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.cn: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.en: The rent is reasonable, and moreover, the location is perfect.
sentences.cn: 这房租合理, 而且地点优越.

sentences.en: The source of the information is irrelevant. Moreover, the information need not be confidential.
sentences.cn: 信息来源无关紧要，而且也不一定必须是机密的。

sentences.en: The young find everything so simple. The young, moreover, see it as their duty to be happy and do their best to be so.
sentences.cn: 年轻人觉得每件事都那么简单；而且，他们把幸福视为自己的责任，并努力去实现幸福。

sentences.en: Toleration, moreover , is something which is won , not granted.
sentences.cn: 容忍, 是从艰苦中争取来的, 不是别人赏赐的.

trans.tran_en: in addition – used to introduce information that adds to or supports what has previously been said
